name: Shifter Components for Galaxy
description:
Galaxy is a design system for interfaces from websites to product dashboards.


What's included

This Kit includes components, colors, type styles in both English and Japanese, all explained through documentation.


Variants

Most Galaxy components use variants. Variants allow you to quickly change component options. Clicking a component will show available variants in the sidebar.


Exploring

This kit is meant to be a jumping off point for your projects. Feel free to generate your own color scales, use different fonts, or change components and add your own.



Learn more about Shifter at getshifter.io


Learn more about DigitalCube at en.digitalcube.jp
